release_note: iPad improvements Writing with Apple Pencil is speedy as ever! The app now opens on the last viewed board like it used to Improvements to dragging content Undo redo is more reliable Line tool is easier to drag and connect To do lists are easier to use iPhone improvements Fixed a bug related to loading shared boards

iPad bug fixes Documents open as expected on iPad iPhone bug fixes The plus button add content in Columns works again The share extension from the Photos app doesn t ask you to login incorrectly You can now upload multiple images at once from the app

iPad new features Undo Redo buttons have been added to the top of boards Create a link by pasting a url directly onto selected text Attach comments to tables iPad improvements Drawing with Apple Pencil now works as expected Search is 5x faster and much easier to find what you re looking for Table cells and formulas are easier to use Board export options: you can now choose to include or exclude sub boards Better support for Korean text in text editors
iPad: Improvements to table cell type changes Improvements to tables formula referencing Behind the scenes improvements for upcoming features
New on iPad: Tables! Plan timelines calculate budgets and keep track of the details. They re a simple but powerful way to help organize your creative projects.
Performance and behind the scenes feature updates on iPad
Performance and behind the scenes feature updates on iPad
Performance improvements for iPad
iPad: Minor bug fixes related to onboarding
iPad: Fixed newly uploaded files not immediately available to view or download Fix to allow links inside cloned cards Performance improvements to load times
iPhone: Uploading images from your phone is now much more reliable.
Fixed minor formatting and link bugs on iPhone and iPad
iPhone: Formatting improvements for To do lists iPad: Multi page PDFs now open in the app
iPhone: Re ordering To do lists now feels nicer.
iPhone: Adjusted to do list editor reordering UI Added option to upload images straight from the camera Fixed note editor placeholder would flash when opened
iPad: Fixed the collapse column button not appearing Fixed the quick line tool not appearing Fixed presentation mode not triggering Fixed board exports Fixed file downloads

New on iPhone You can now reply to comments Bug fixes improvements Improved the Note editor Fixed a To do list crash Fixed timezone handling for Reminders Fixed a bug that triggered a sync conflict to often

iPad updates: Minor bug fixes Improvements to security performance and stability Improvements to toggling of Unsorted notes Fixed the positioning of toolbar menus to avoid header Lots of behind the scenes improvements to upcoming features
New on iPhone: Set due dates and reminders for tasks Improvements to iPad: Better handling of large video files Fixed a bug that prevented image cropping

New on iPhone: Embed and play Youtube videos Improvements on iPhone: Recent boards now displays boards from web and mobile Improvements to sharing permissions Improvements to the Notes and To do list editors Minor bug fixes Improvements to iPad: Fixed a bug that caused some images to not upload correctly Fixed keyboard shortcut bugs
iPad updates: Increased support for uploading more file formats Security improvements Minor bug fixes

New features for iPhone: Recently Viewed boards: Find these handy shortcuts in the Search tab Bug fixes improvements for iPhone: General improvements to file security and permissions Board content counts are now more reliable Bug fixes improvements for iPad: Fixed keyboard bugs for iPad: Bold Italics Underline and Tab now work as they should Clicking on email links now opens your email app
iPad: Fixed a content syncing issue that occurred when switching between apps
iPhone: Fixed a crash when tapping images in a column

New features for iPhone: Full text style menu: Includes headings text colors code formatting and more Centre align text and headings Image carousel: Swipe through all images on a board Renaming columns Bug fixes improvements for iPhone: Fixed offline syncing issue Fixed uploading multiple images via the share extension Made text formatting more consistent Improved performance of To do lists Bug fixes improvements for iPad: Fixed the positioning of lines when they re connected to cards within columns Changed the aspect ratio of videos that play in full screen so they fit the window now rather than fill it Fixed a bug that caused content that gets dropped into a new board to sometimes disappear temporarily Bug fixes and improvements to the Align Distribute tools
iPhone: Fixed an issue where viewing some images would crash the app

iPhone: New features: Share boards Add content directly into a column Indent Outdent list items Duplicate boards with long press Download files onto your phone Bug fixes: Account verification can now be done in app Formatting improvements for dark mode Better display of long captions on images Stability improvements to Share extension iPad: Scrolling around a board is now much faster The text style menu is easier to use
iPhone: Fixed image rendering failing in some cases

iPhone: New: Long press a note to copy its content New: Documents and files are displayed separately in column and board content counts Fixed comment thread counting towards content limit for free users Fixed the order of comments not matching their created dates Fixed placeholder image elements displaying a loading spinner instead of the placeholder icon Fixed share icons on boards not displaying perfectly round Fixed backgrounds on files and boards to be consistent with the web app Fixed long title in task lists not making wrapping into multiple lines Fixed image rendering sometimes failing without a way to recover
iPad: Bug fixes security improvements
iPad: Enabled better logging for troubleshooting issues Removed irrelevant message about web clippers

iPad: Fix a bug that caused the alignment and distribution tools to break when content is added beyond the top left of a board Fix a bug that prevented files with capitals in their extension from being recognised correctly Fix a bug that broke the auto layout when images are dropped onto a board Minor UI other behind the scenes improvements Fixes to allow files with special characters to be correctly downloaded when exporting boards as ZIP Security improvements Other behind the scenes improvements
iPhone: Update the implementation of our syncing conflict resolution

iPad: What s New: Now you can choose from combinations of colors for your board icons What s Changed: Improvements to focus mode Fixed issue with board ZIP exports when exported image has an empty caption Improved document syncing reliability More behind the scenes improvements Prevent double click on images or sketches in presentation mode Prevent editing documents when the browser loses internet connection Performance improvements to image uploads Ensure the secondary color of board icons are set correctly when creating shortcuts Prevent opening multiple popups on double click for PDFs in Presentation mode Changes to prevent boards from growing too large Fix to ensure that custom template show content correctly when used Security improvements
iPhone: Improvements to uploading new images. iPad: Fixed a crash that occurs when trying to record videos to upload to your Milanote boards.
iPhone: Improvements to sync conflict detection and handling

iPhone: Fixed to do lists text overflowing in the editor iPad: NEW: Zoom! Fixed a bug relating to intermittent loading issues for Image cards UX improvements in board sharing modal Improve reliability of downloading all images files in board as ZIP file

iPad: Added ability to export all files and images on a board as a .zip file Preview images on video cards can now be replaced Tweaked and polished app design in dark mode Fixed a small usability issue when enabling a board share link Fixed the card title colour of document cards when the board background is dark but the application is in light mode or vice versa Fixed a bug relating to intermittent loading issues for image cards Other minor UI tweaks and behind the scenes changes

iPhone: Downloaded PDFs are now stored on device for a short period of time so you don t need to download them every time you want to view them. Fixed an issue where editing some to do lists and then returning to view your boards would crash. Fixed an issue where trying to view a PDF would load an incorrect downloaded file. Fixed some issues with our visual design when loading your boards.

iPhone: Fixed an issue where dismissing the editor on an existing card causes crashes the app. Fixed an issue where links that launch the app were not sending users to the correct board. Fixed an issue where tapping on text in any cards would not trigger the card to be focused. Edits that occur on multiple devices that can t be synchronised now create a new duplicate card so that users can work with all edits made. PDF files can now be shared from the app. iPad: Fixed an issue where links that launch the app were only loading a user s first board.

iPhone: Fixed crashes that occur when loading specific images. Fixed an issue with syncing which caused elements to disappear only on the iPhone app only to reappear later. Fixed an issue with logging in where the login prompt screen wouldn t transition to the user s content. Fixed some UI bugs.
iPhone: Fix incorrect force logout when visiting a comment only board Fix incorrect force logout mechanism Fix persistence management
iPhone: Fix various issues with syncing pending changes that are made while the phone is offline
iPhone: Fix various intermittent crashes on launch
iPhone: Updated board icon background color logic Fixed aliases not using update board icon in some scenarios
iPhone iPad: Fixed an issue with the login flow iPhone: Fixed an intermittent crash on launch and login
iPhone: Fix intermittent crash on launching the app

iPad: Updated the way the app handle loading images Improvements to template selections Fixed issue where image search popup occasionally crashes the app Fixed image modal view for images with transparent backgrounds Added truncation of long breadcrumb lists in the header Improved behaviour when scrolling a selected note into view Fixed a bug where two loaders would show when using a template Fixed a bug with unreadable warning text in the Image Modal when clearing a drawing

iPhone: Preparation for our new board icons Fixed various crashes and performance issues when viewing boards Fixed crash on opening text editors on iOS 16 iPad: Updated the shortcut for text strikethroughs Localisation improvements to the calendar when picking a due date for a task Gestures are now shown in the Shortcuts popup in the iPad app Fixed various issues with the rich text toolbar

iPad: Users can now be removed from boards when the Invite editors with a link option is turned on Improvements to dark mode colours Allow delete undo and other shortcuts to work after touching the canvas Fixed a bug that would prevent some users with lots of unseen notifications to not be able to access their notifications

iPad: Users without images will now have a colour assigned to them Allowed lines to be created directly out of comments Fixed the position of the resize handle on comments Updating comments will no longer shift their height when becoming editable Fixed bold Cmd B and italic Cmd I keyboard shortcuts not working Removed align centre toolbar tool when a task is selected Fixed rich text toolbar appearing for non editor text input e.g. search field Fixed rich text toolbar not appearing for Documents the first time after app launch

iPad: Changed the style of light mode code blocks to be light rather than dark grey Fixed a bug that now allows replaced images that are being uploaded to be undone Show an overlay when replacing images Fixed a bug where an entire paragraph is deleted if the text selection ends at the start of the following paragraph Fixed a user selection bug when returning to a slept iPad Fixes to clone cards when the original copy is deleted Improvements to copy paste behaviour when pasting between boards Fixed the hover overlay showing on image placeholders Adjusted element selection behaviour when dismissing the keyboard Enabled pasting from system clipboard allowing copy paste from Files Photos and so on Added two finger tap gesture to trigger the context menu right click menu on desktop Updated three finger editing gestures to work with text editing e.g. pinch in to copy selected text on a note Updated toolbar to hide centre align button on editing comments iPhone and iPad: Updated share extension to prioritise URLs over images over texts

Fixed some cases where elements couldn t be created or updated. Fixed some inconsistent ordering of elements in boards and Quick Notes. Fixed cases where using a Universal Link does not complete. Fixed some crashes that were occurring when performing a search. v3.0.2 iPad: Fixed analytics v3.0.1 iPad: Added support for deep linking to boards Text clipper on Notes to allow quickly splitting notes apart Fixed an issue with a text input cursor showing after opening a Sketch card Fixed the size of the selection border of File Document icons Board syncing indicator has been moved to the Milanote icon to the right of the Home board in the breadcrumbs Touch rejection on the Save Discard buttons when in drawing mode has been improved. You can now tap those buttons with your finger after using the Apple Pencil.

iPad: Fixed analytics v3.0.1 iPad: Added support for deep linking to boards Text clipper on Notes to allow quickly splitting notes apart Fixed an issue with a text input cursor showing after opening a Sketch card Fixed the size of the selection border of File Document icons Board syncing indicator has been moved to the Milanote icon to the right of the Home board in the breadcrumbs Touch rejection on the Save Discard buttons when in drawing mode has been improved. You can now tap those buttons with your finger after using the Apple Pencil.

Added support for deep linking to boards Text clipper on Notes to allow quickly splitting notes apart Fixed an issue with a text input cursor showing after opening a Sketch card Fixed the size of the selection border of File Document icons Board syncing indicator has been moved to the Milanote icon to the right of the Home board in the breadcrumbs Touch rejection on the Save Discard buttons when in drawing mode has been improved. You can now tap those buttons with your finger after using the Apple Pencil.

Introducing the Milanote iPad app! Support for Apple Pencil Edit and share your boards just like on desktop Long press to drag and organize content Drag images from other apps into Milanote This is just the start. We ve got lots more planned for the iPad app including pinch to zoom . We have also updated the iPhone app: We ve improved things behind the scenes and this means boards load faster! Fix: Using emojis when creating a to do list no longer crash the app. Fix: Some situations where loading a board caused the app to crash have been fixed.

v2.6.1: Fixes: Uploading an image now makes sure we have an Internet connection before starting. v2.6.0: Updates: Notes and to do lists can be duplicated in the app. Links in notes and other text elements are now tappable. Notifications has been redone and now has a new look. Login screens have been redone and now have a new look. When launching the app if you left off while viewing Quick Notes or Your Boards you ll be taken to that tab. Fixes: Some UI alignment has been updated. v2.5.1: Fix: Documents can be edited live again. v2.5.0: Update: Comments are more reliably updated live in the app. Update: Editing live now syncs more reliably. Update: The Live Editor will now sync and quit when we close our server connection to prevent content loss. Update: Empty Card and To do items now look more like in our desktop app. Update: Font sizes have been made uniform through all of the app. Update: Cut and Paste occur more reliably throughout the app. Fix: Changing colour scheme within the app s settings is now reflected immediately. Fix: A crash involving syncing between shared users has been fixed. Fix: The colour of some of our text elements have been fixed. Fix: Some data that was remaining on device even after flagged for deletion is now properly deleted. Fix: Layout of our To do Lists is more reliable particularly during editing.

Login screens have been redone and now have a new look. When launching the app if you left off while viewing Quick Notes or Your Boards you ll be taken to that tab. v2.5.1: Fix: Documents can be edited live again. v2.5.0: Update: Comments are more reliably updated live in the app. Update: Editing live now syncs more reliably. Update: The Live Editor will now sync and quit when we close our server connection to prevent content loss. Update: Empty Card and To do items now look more like in our desktop app. Update: Font sizes have been made uniform through all of the app. Update: Cut and Paste occur more reliably throughout the app. Fix: Changing colour scheme within the app s settings is now reflected immediately. Fix: A crash involving syncing between shared users has been fixed. Fix: The colour of some of our text elements have been fixed. Fix: Layout of our To do Lists is more reliable particularly during editing. v2.4.4: Small updates and bug fixes: Update: Deleting the last Unsorted element now properly closes the Unsorted shelf on the desktop. Update: Background colours on Card elements now show up correctly and more reliably. Update: Background colours on empty boards now show up correctly. Update: Notifications now has pull to refresh. Fix: A few crashes in the app have been resolved. Fix: Sharing URL links in the app now syncs with the desktop more reliably. Fix: Some URLs that weren t saving correctly now do save correctly. Fix: Some To do Lists that previously couldn t be edited can now be edited. Fix: Some information about To do Lists such as indentation now save more reliably. Fix: A bunch of small UI fixes re alignments and re colouring. v2.4.3: Fix: Some crashes that happen immediately upon loading a board have now been resolved v2.4.2: Fix: Sub boards of editable shared boards are now properly editable in the app v2.4.1: Fix: Sharing to Milanote from other apps and from the web in Safari was crashing but has been fixed! v2.4.0: New: Clone elements now appear in the app. New: Comments attached to elements in the web app can be accessed in the app. New: Link elements can now be created in the app when a URL is the only thing typed in to a Card when creating a new element. Fix: Some occasons where a notification wasn t loading the correct board has been fixed. Fix: Some columns were loading content erroneously causing the app to crash. This has been fixed!

v2.4.1: Fix: Sharing to Milanote from other apps and from the web in Safari was crashing but has been fixed! v2.4.0: New: Clone elements now appear in the app. New: Comments attached to elements in the web app can be accessed in the app. New: Link elements can now be created in the app when a URL is the only thing typed in to a Card when creating a new element. This has been fixed! v2.3.2: Fix: Loading your notifications has been made more reliable! Fix: Links into the app that we can t handle now forward you to your web browser. Fix: Cards with transparent backgrounds now show correctly. Fix: Long pressing on elements for the context menu now animates more nicely. Change: Elements created with the Share Extension are now sorted to your selected board s Unsorted Notes. v2.3.1: Fix: Opening the app then using our desktop app would occasionally load the wrong Home board. We ve fixed this! v2.3.0: New: Your board canvas background colours now show up in the app! We fixed a few bits of unexpected behaviour as well: Fix: The currently viewed board now correctly syncs when you return to the app. Fix: You can now copy text from the app and paste into password fields phone number fields and other text fields! Fix: Adding more complex content to Milanote via. Share from other apps now correctly adds just one element to your board. Fix: Some board titles had disappeared. They re back now and your board titles show up correctly. Fix: Create Quick Note shortcut from Home screen now works when you re already on Quick Notes. Fix: Our Drawing elements now show their colour correctly.

v2.0.5 Fix: Board s permissions are now accounted correctly. v2.0.4: Fix: The Play button on video Files now appears correctly. v2.0.3: New: You can now download your images and video files to your device s Photo Library by long pressing on their cards in your boards! New: New Quick Note shortcut works again and can be accessed by long pressing Milanote s app icon on the home screen when logged in. Fix: Some shadows that were showing incorrectly have been fixed. Fix: To do Lists are now easier to tap to edit when viewing your boards. v2.0.2: Fix: Some cases of sluggish navigation have been resolved. Fix: A crash during our sign up process has been fixed. Fix: Some cases of crashing when searching for certain boards have been fixed. v2.0.1: Improved general usage of the application Remove verbose error alerts from some areas Fixed Notification screen not loading in some cases Fixed audio and video files not being tappable and playable Fixed transparent images displaying with non transparent backgrounds Fixed errors on navigating to shared boards v2.0.0: What s new in this version A shiny new interface! Offline mode Faster editing and saving Toggle light dark mode in Settings Delete content by pressing and holding any item This is a full rewrite of the app so please let us know if you spot any issues or bugs! Contact support milanote.com or message us via the settings tab in the app. Thanks for using Milanote!

Fix: To do Lists are now easier to tap to edit when viewing your boards. v2.0.2: Fix: Some cases of sluggish navigation have been resolved. Fix: A crash during our sign up process has been fixed. Offline mode Faster editing and saving Toggle light dark mode in Settings Delete content by pressing and holding any item This is a full rewrite of the app so please let us know if you spot any issues or bugs! Contact support milanote.com or message us via the settings tab in the app. Thanks for using Milanote!

What s new in this version A shiny new interface! Offline mode Faster editing and saving Toggle light dark mode in Settings Delete content by pressing and holding any item This is a full rewrite of the app so please let us know if you spot any issues or bugs! Contact support milanote.com or message us via the settings tab in the app. Thanks for using Milanote!
Fixed fetching remote search results Fixed Quick Notes content order
Fixed incorrect error on navigating to a shared board
Updated rich text parsing in preparation for new text styles. Temporarily render two heading styles as one.
Updated rich text parsing in preparation for new text styles.
What s new: Updated notification tab to support Reaction notifications Bug fixes: Fixed the share extension showing recent boards as New Board . This was a fix on our backend.
Bug fixes: Fixed the notification tab not displaying any notifications in some cases Fixed the notification tab crashing in some cases Added additional error parsing for Sign in with Apple error
Added a temporary workflow for an upcoming sharing feature on the web app
What s new: Updated the app to use our new permission model Added the sound option to push notifications permissions

Bug fixes: Fixed the navigation bar button appearance in the composer Fixed login credentials saving against our staging URL Fixed crash on using the camera when adding images Fixed crash on the notification tab This update also bumps the deployment target to iOS 13.0 meaning older iOS versions are no longer supported.

What s new: Sign in with Apple On launch select either Quick Notes or Your Boards depending on which one was last selected Updated Intercom SDK Bug fixes: Fixed animated GIFs not animating in the full screen view Fixed socket connection issue Fixed unhandled deep links being intercepted by the app now it redirects to Safari

Bug fixes Fixed crash on deleting bullet on an empty note Fixed unsorted notes created by another user s iPhone showing on top of the list Fixed board viewing permissions resolving incorrectly especially on Notifications and Search Fixed the rich text composer accepting unsupported attachment attributes on pasting e.g. images. This was causing OBJ tags to appear on notes. Improved the memory usage of the share extension it can now handle more images at once before hitting the low memory alert

Bug fixes Fixed text sometimes being cut off when inside of containers Fixed dark mode color for code blocks Fixed various crashes identified by the crash reporter including a crash on login Fixed the keyboard blinking when switching between creating content types Fixed Quick Notes and Your Boards not appearing immediately on login Fixed boards empty states showing before the board has been loaded Fixed the tab bar being cut off when the status bar is larger than usual e.g. maps navigation personal hotspot indicator Fixed notifications tab animating unnecessarily

What s new Dark Mode on iOS 13. This follows the iOS 13 system wide setting Updated the notification tab to display notifications from task reminders and assignments Universal links from our emails. Tapping on a board link in our emails will now open the app View due dates and assignments for tasks. This is currently read only on the iOS app use the web app to add or modify Bug fixes Fixed issue on opening non audio video files Fixed deletion animation for the last task in a task list
Fixed the delete button not always working Fixed image upload orientation issue Added forward compatibility for parsing new notification types

v1.1.2 What s new General stability improvements when loading board data v1.1.1 Bug fixes Fixed notification list not updating correctly Fixed search tab permissions v1.1.0 What s new New tab: Notifications. Track your collaborations here New tab PRO only : Search. Search the content of every board you ve created Comment threads. Reply edit and delete comments in the comment thread view. Tap a comment to get started Universal links. Links to boards on app.milanote.com now opens directly in the app Push notifications for board shares and comments New image picker style Checked items in task lists are now grey again Bug fixes Fixed uploading images from the share extension showing failed state when launching the app Fixed uploading large image using the share extension failing due to memory constraints Fixed link elements not displaying title changes Fixed automatic link conversion converting the link to lowercase Fixed task checks sometimes not reflecting the changes Fixed line breaks and paragraph breaks being rendered the same way

What s new Offline mode browsing. You can now browse your boards while offline Siri integration to add notes task list and tasks Image uploads improvements. An upload would do automatic retries if it fails Task list UI update animation and haptic feedback In line links in notes. The text editor now automatically detect in line links and make them tappable New image picker for image uploads that supports multiple image selection URL deep linking Bug fixes Fix share extension creating duplicate image elements Visit https: milanote.com releases ios to see previous patch notes

What s new Tap on the title when viewing a board to edit its name and color Board and column deletion Deleted something accidentally Login to the web and browse the trash! New app icon aligning it with the Milanote web app When creating a link element a helpful tip to enable the Milanote share extension is shown All texts now support dynamic system font size Bug fixes Fix crash on adding caption to an image that has none Fix token expiry not logging out the session correctly Fix vertical alignment on notes Fix text being cut off on cards within containers columns or tasks Fix text selection over multiple lines not highlighting correctly Fix dynamic font size causing to do list checkboxes to be misaligned Fix copying text from the app to a different app causing it to paste encoded data Fix text missing from notes under certain formatting Fix the content mode for image previews on links Adjust the delete button from swipe to delete to center to the visible part of a long element

What s new: You can now create boards right from the app Automatically convert Notes with only a single URL in the first line into Links Added Help center and Live chat to the Account screen Added delete completed button to the To do list editing screen Added the ability to swipe to delete to the To do list editing screen Bug fixes: Fixed misaligned autocorrect highlight while editing a note Hide irrelevant Google Sign in error Updated the styling for a shortcut to a board. Distinct styling for: a shared board a shortcut to a shared board and a shortcut to a private board
